title: israt1@
author: israt1@
created_time: August 13, 2023, 03:08:53 PMLast edit: August 13, 2023, 03:40:27 PM by israt1@
content: Thank you very much dear forum. For birthday wishes

comments.author: leonair
comments.body: You will be greeted with a birthday cake every year according to the date of birth set in your profile. This does not mean your account creation date.Â  It happens to everyone it is a common thing.Â  It is set in the forum algorithm which works automatically.Â  If you change your date of birth now and input tomorrow's date then tomorrow will also be wished for your birthday However if this is your original date of birth then wish you a happy birthday

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Here is his place: Announce your rank up, merit or any achievements that makes you feel great!You can celebrate anything that feels great to you!

comments.author: EFS
comments.body: Happy birthday.We didn't do anything special for you though, it's a standard SMF feature.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: EFS on August 13, 2023, 05:24:02 PMHappy birthday.We didn't do anything special for you though, it's a standard SMF feature. Sure we are. We are wishing him a Happy Birthday!!!

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: Quote from: leonair on August 13, 2023, 04:23:21 PMYou will be greeted with a birthday cake every year according to the date of birth set in your profile.Oh really...was never aware of this, thanks for the info And Happy 24th Birthday to you @israt1 enjoy the BCT cake  ðŸŽ‚

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Quote from: leonair on August 13, 2023, 04:23:21 PMYou will be greeted with a birthday cake every year according to the date of birth set in your profile.It's even possible for him to celebrate his 25th birthday the next day if the OP changes his birthday and the year after this in the profile. Is it really special?But this isn't a problem - I just came to wish the OP a happy birthday too. Even for me birthdays are not so special in the forum among users - but everyone can present their happiness in any way. It would probably be nice to be celebrated on an achievement thread - as other users have recommended.

comments.author: Bitcoin_people
comments.body: Happy 24th birthday to you and wish you long life. It's a special day for you, the wishes you've received from bitcoin forums are truly amazing. @israt1@ Look forward to your 25th birthday and celebrate grandly in the coming year.Cheers

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: _BlackStar on August 13, 2023, 10:07:56 PMQuote from: leonair on August 13, 2023, 04:23:21 PMYou will be greeted with a birthday cake every year according to the date of birth set in your profile.It's even possible for him to celebrate his 25th birthday the next day if the OP changes his birthday and the year after this in the profile. Is it really special?But this isn't a problem - I just came to wish the OP a happy birthday too. Even for me birthdays are not so special in the forum among users - but everyone can present their happiness in any way. It would probably be nice to be celebrated on an achievement thread - as other users have recommended.I just thought about it. The forum is so delightful that lovers of attracting attention can celebrate their birthdays at least every day. Many hide their date of birth for privacy, while others simply invent it because, on the Internet, we can be of different ages.But, OP, if you need it, then congratulations, and good luck with your life! :

comments.author: israt1@
comments.body: Thanks everyone. I have no particular reason to create the topic. I never noticed in the past years that the forum does birthday wishes. I suddenly saw it today and happily created the topic.

comments.author: Pingrapole
comments.body: Forum means a happy place here we always enjoy a birthday party. And from all of us,Â happyÂ birthday to you, the gift sent to you are not only happy for you, but also for us, so once again May yourÂ lifeÂ  very beautiful and live long.May your happiness lives in the forum, all your WillÂ be hopesÂ  fulfilled and may you create meaningful life.Â HappyÂ birthday again and again.
